name: sidekick-chrome-extension
description: Enhanced sidebar and tools for Torn.com with modular features including todo lists, timers, attack lists, and more.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-files
scripts.copy-files: xcopy /s /e /y src dist\src\ && xcopy /y manifest.json dist\ && xcopy /s /e /y popup dist\popup\ && xcopy /s /e /y icons dist\icons\
scripts.dev: npm run build && echo Extension built for development. Load the 'dist' folder in Chrome.
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch src --watch manifest.json --watch popup --ext js,json,html,css --exec "npm run build"

author: Machiacelli
